meanings.definition: Not reciprocated or returned in kind.
meanings.sent1: Her nonreciprocal feelings towards him left him feeling unappreciated.
meanings.sent2: Their nonreciprocal friendship meant she always gave more than she received.
meanings.sent3: It was a nonreciprocal exchange of gifts - she gave him a present, but he forgot her birthday.
meanings.sent4: The nonreciprocal nature of their relationship became more apparent as time went on.
meanings.sent5: The nonreciprocal love he felt for her was like a one-way street with no turns.

meanings.sent1: The nonreciprocal agreement only benefited one party.
meanings.sent2: Their nonreciprocal interests meant they rarely found common ground.
meanings.sent3: It was a nonreciprocal decision, as she didn't consult anyone else before making it.
meanings.sent4: The nonreciprocal distribution of resources led to tension among the group.
meanings.sent5: The nonreciprocal division of labor left one person with all the work.
